name: Afraid Of The Dark (VMan)
description:
This game was done in my third session and had 3 weeks to do it.

Based on something personal i chose my fears of the dark when i was younger. When i was alone and the breaker went off i had to go in the basement towards the boiler room to pull the switch and reset the breaker.

The life bar on the top left indicates your life. When you are near a light source you regain health

I over-scoped this project.
